item.source: MAKING TELES/SHORTCUTS TO BANK, PK, other things in EMOTES.. HELP!

item.title: MAKING TELES/SHORTCUTS TO BANK, PK, other things in EMOTES.. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Double Check my work first before implementing, as I suck with anything that isn’t purely objects, but I think it would something like

case 168: // yes emote sendQuest("Bank", 180); setAnimation(1331); teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; sendMessage("You teleport to the bank"); break;

Please have someone double check it, because I just wrote it, and no the coords are not correct they take you to varrock center. And i’m half asleep, but I believe that the main part of it.

Or rather create a new void

public void BankTeleportVarrock(){ if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0) animation(1331, absY, absX); teleportToX = 3210; teleportToY = 3424; }

then add this

case 168: // yes emote sendQuest("Bank", 180); BankTeleportVarrock(); break;

Compile and Run, but like i said I implore you to have someone a little more experienced than me check this for accuracy, before you risk corrupt your client.

Read full topic
